metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2983 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Drupal 6.x before 6.31 and 7.x before 7.27 does not properly isolate the cached data of different anonymous users, which allows remote anonymous users to obtain sensitive interim form input information in opportunistic situations via unspecified vectors.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Daniel F. Kudwien, Rodionov Igor, Ryan Szrama, Roman Zimmermann

notes.Note: seth-arnold> See Drupal's advisory, changes to hosted applications may be necessary

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
